pr_title: Remove unused doXContentBody impl from ScriptFieldMapper

timeline.message:
Remove unused doXContentBody impl from ScriptFieldMapper

Relates to #59332

timeline.bodyText: see also #59968 . ParametrizedFieldMapper redefines toXContent hence doContentBody is never called. I proposed a change that makes it final so this method is not left behind when migrating an existing mapper.
timeline.author: javanna

timeline.bodyText: I removed this because it is already tracked in the meta issue.
timeline.author: javanna
